description: Controlled vocabulary and rendering constraints for CompNarra clinical documentation.

medium_paragraph.definition: Five to six sentences with clinical detail.

long_paragraph.definition: Seven to nine sentences. Used for core clinical narratives.

bulleted_3_4.definition: Three to four bullet points using objective language.

bulleted_5_7.definition: Five to seven bullet points using objective language.

table_md.definition: Markdown-rendered table. All cells must be populated per override rules.

table_json.definition: Structured table output used internally prior to markdown rendering.

null_handling.narrative_fallback: Information not available at time of assessment.
